original_title: The Rise & Fall of a White Collar Hooligan
overview: Casual football hooligan Mike Jacobs is going nowhere in life when he meets old friend Eddie Hill at a football match that turns nasty off the pitch. Under Eddieâ€™s tutelage he soon finds himself inducted into the world of credit card fraud, where organised gangs withdraw hundreds of thousands of pounds from cash machines every night. As Mike becomes seduced by the money and women that come with his new lifestyle, the dangers increase and he soon finds events spiralling beyond his control.
tagline: This beautiful game isn't life or death... it's more important than that.
title: The Rise & Fall of a White Collar Hooligan
